name: Eatocrat
tag_list: restaurant-promotions, loyalty, rewards, analyze-customer, restaurant-business-intelligence, targeted-promotion, instant-promotion, track-promotion, customer-connection
overview:
Eatocrat helps restaurants and their customers stay connected.

Eatocrat helps restaurants to unearth critical Customer Business Intelligence in form of rich Analytics and Data Visualization in order to help improve bottom lines and make informed & better business decisions. The EatoCrat platform is an interactive, intuitive and easy-to-use application that runs on any Web browser on a Smart Phone, a Tablet computer or a PC.

Customers can earn restaurant reward points and redeem their points for restaurant goodies by participating in promotions. Participating restaurants can create instant and highly targeted promotions, analyze their customer’s eating & spending habits, measure customer loyalty and thereby make better business decisions.
